The Quranic researcher is that those who believed and did the righteous to release from those who are dead, and others are for them because of what is mentioned of faith and good deeds, the gardens With the trees, the rivers are left under it, and if I want the earth that is covered by it, then the convergence is to adopt its apparent part, so it is the same as it is the same.The name of Paradise is raised from it, and the sentence was separated.They repent of that, as a sign of what they are mentioned and their possession of them, and it was said: For the artistic arts, and the remembrance of their interpretation of what is mentioned and what is in it and what is in it.By the way of the domain and the distance of the house in the grace and honor, and its place of lifting on the verbishness of its news: the great winner who is tempted by the one who is in it and what is in it with the lord of it Wrongs, and the successful wooked from evil and the nail is good, so the second direction in the sign is a source that is called the verb, and on the first one.
